modName: Black and Gold Ebony  Armor and Weapons
summary: Re-texture for Ebony weapons and armor. Armor for both male and female.
descriptionHtml:
I did not like the Ebony textures on the weapons and armor. I made new textures and applied them to the armor and weapons. There are slight differences in the male and female armors. I did this because hey, its two different types and I didn't want the vanilla armor showing up in game. There is a video to show the armor but it won't embed. Sorry about that. But it is in the video tab. Every ebony weapon is re-skined,textured, normal mapped and M mapped. I hope you enjoy my first submission to this site! If you like it please endorse it.


[center][size=5][b]I have made new armors which include Daedric, Dragonbone, and Glass armors which are all Standalone Armors. They can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50825/?]here![/url][/b][/size][/center]

[center][youtube]UdifcADz4Wg[/youtube][/center]
author: Blueguile
